potassium_iodide_pills.name: Potassium Iodide Pills
potassium_iodide_pills.desc: Small, emergency pills that help flush radioactive isotopes from the system, mitigating the effects of radiation exposure.

medkit_small.name: Small Medkit
medkit_small.desc: A compact emergency medical kit containing basic trauma dressings, disinfectant, and a powerful analgesic. Suitable for minor wounds.

medkit_large.name: Large Medkit
medkit_large.desc: A comprehensive field medic kit equipped for severe injuries. Contains advanced coagulants, sutures, and a broad-spectrum antibiotic.

oxygen_tank.name: Oxygen Tank
oxygen_tank.desc: A compact, high-pressure oxygen canister designed for personal rebreather systems. Essential for prolonged operations in hostile atmospheres.

alien_artifact.name: Alien Artifact
alien_artifact.desc: A pulsating crystalline object of unknown origin. Its energy readings are off the charts. It must be secured.
